text: geudaeneun malhala : ‘ulineun hananimgwa, uliege naelyeojin geosgwa, ibeulahim(abeulaham)gwa iseumail(iseuma-el)gwa iseuhag(isag)gwa ya-eukkub(yagob)gwa (iseuhag-ui) sonjadeul-ege naelyeojin geosgwa, musa(mose)wa isa(yesu)wa seonjijadeul-i geudeul-ui junim-eulobuteo bad-eun geos-eul midnola. ulineun geudeul jung eotteon nugudo gubunhaji anihamyeo ulineun geubunkke bogjonghaneun jadeul(museullimdeul)ila.’
